articles.title: Rob Reiner: Two found dead at LA home owned by director, police say - BBC
articles.description: Authorities were called the storied Hollywood director's home on Sunday and found the bodies of a man, 78, and a woman, 68.

articles.title: ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Bosses on the Shocking Finale, the Future of Pennywise and That Post-Credits Scene That Ties It All Together - Variety
articles.description: 'It: Welcome to Derry' EPs Andy and Barbara Muschietti and Jason Fuchs on Season 1's finale, Pennywise's future, the post-credits flash-forward cameo.

articles.title: Rian Johnson Says He Has “Kernels” Of An Idea For ‘Knives Out 4’ - Deadline
articles.description: On the heels of the release of 'Wake Up Dead Man,' Rian Johnson said he has some inklings about where he wants to stretch the whodunit genre next.

articles.title: Taylor Swift Performs ‘Aunt Tay’ Duties in a Luxe Winter Coat of Many Fall Colors - glamour.com
articles.description: One day after her 36th birthday, Taylor Swift attended the latest Chiefs game alongside Kylie Kelce and her daughters.

articles.title: Watch Lily Allen Perform “Sleepwalking,” Bring Out Dakota Johnson for “Madeline” on Saturday Night Live - Pitchfork
articles.description: The British pop star appeared as herself in a sketch themed around the title track from her new album, West End Girl

articles.title: Paul Rudd Says Ice Cube’s Approval of New ‘Anaconda’ Is Like “Being Blessed By the Pope” - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Rudd stars alongside Jack Black and Steve Zahn in the meta reimagining of the 1997 cult classic, which was fronted by Ice Cube and Jennifer Lopez.

articles.title: Box Office: ‘Zootopia 2’ Returns to No. 1 as ‘Ella McCay’ Suffers One of Worst Debuts Ever for Disney With $2 Million - Variety
articles.description: "Zootopia 2" is again the No. 1 film in North America as newcomer "Ella McCay" bombs in its box office debut.

See John Cena Tap Out to End Wrestling Career in WWE Retirement Match - Rolling Stone
articles.description: John Cena fought in what he promised was his final WWE match Saturday, with the wrestler tapping out to end his illustrious career in the ring.

articles.title: On turning 100, comedy legend Dick Van Dyke says: ‘You want to live more, which I plan to’ - PBS
articles.description: Comedy icon Dick Van Dyke celebrated his 100th birthday on Saturday, hitting the century mark some six decades after he sang and danced with Julie Andrews in “Mary Poppins” and starred in his self-titled sitcom.

articles.title: N.J.-born actor best known for ’90s film classics dies at 60 - NJ.com
articles.description: The actor was found dead by one of his neighbors

articles.title: People Are Already Creating Ghoulishly Horrifying Sora Disney Videos - Futurism
articles.description: Sora users have been churning out edgy AI Disney and Pixar style trailers well before Disney signed a licensing agreement with OpenAI.

articles.title: ‘Heated Rivalry’ Stars on Shane and Ilya’s Relationship and Why We Love to Yearn - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Hudson Williams and Connor Storrie dish on that episode four turmoil and why it needed to happen.

articles.title: King Charles III says early diagnosis allows his cancer treatment to be reduced - NPR
articles.description: The monarch revealed the positive outlook in a recorded message broadcast on British television as part of a campaign to promote screening, which increases the likelihood of successful treatment.
